title: Review: Dot to Dot: Photo Summary
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/IMG_148111.jpg "IMG_14811")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/IMG_148111.jpg)

So after a fantastic day at Dot to Dot festival in Manchester, it was back to writing up reviews, interviews and sifting through scores of photographs to narrow it down to the best few, to present to the viewers of **_CitR_**.[![The Cheek](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/IMG_14881-e1276437491823-682x1024.jpg "IMG_1488")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/IMG_14881.jpg)

The Cheek, Council Chambers

All photographs taken by Josh Dalton, if you would like to use any of the above images then please email me at crackintheroad@gmail.com.

excerpt.full: Photograph highlights from Dot to Dot Festival.
excerpt.short: So after a fantastic day at Dot to Dot festival in Manchester, it was back to writing ...
